website_summaries.verdict: A tasty option for a keto-friendly snack that is a good source of protein.
pros: Available in chocolate cacao, vanilla almond, and peanut butter chip flavors
Each bar contains 16 grams or more of protein, 3 grams or less of sugar, and no gluten or soy
The bars have a good, chewy texture and are filling and not overly sweet
cons: Does contain sugar alcohols, but most say it has a good balance between sugar alcohol and stevia

customer_reviews.title: Non-GMO Tapioca Fiber is not a healthy ingredients
customer_reviews.text: The reason these tastes so good without suger is because they use Non-GMO Tapioca Fiber which interacts with your body like suger. Non-GMO Tapioca Fiber is manufactured from China mostly and should be avoided in my opinion. Do some research if you don't believe me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: They don't taste like dirty hippies.
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! It's actually good! I have tried just about every natural/paleo-friendly protein bar on Amazon. Most were horrific, a few were tolerable. This is the VERY FIRST flavor I have ever liked. The Atlas chocolate is just okay, but this vanilla almond is genuinely good. If you're tired of eating stuff that tastes like dirty hippies, give these a shot. Though, I must confess I'm a little curious why they call the flavor "Vanilla Almond" when it would be much more accurate to describe it as "Vanilla Cinnamon".
customer_reviews.author: John B. Alleman

customer_reviews.title: Atlast
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate bar – Not too sweet, not too cocoa-heavy, well-balanced. Dense texture, takes a bit of appetite to eat the whole thing (16g protein may have something to do with it). Almond butter complements the chocolate nicely. Great for a post-lunch ‘desert’ if your lunch wasn’t filling, or a tasty standalone meal for any time of the day. PB bar – A solid choice for anyone who loves peanut butter. It’s almost like eating it out of the jar, but it’s in a convenient bar-form and packs a much stronger nutritional punch. Almond bar – My personal favorite. A refreshingly smooth almond flavor with a hint of sweetness. Goes down easy.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Musick

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: I've only tried the peanut butter chip bar, but it's really, really awful tasting. I'm under no illusion that this is a candy bar or treat and have tried MANY protein bars, but I've eaten half of this and am tossing the rest. I hope the other flavors are better, but I've got to say I'm stunned by the high ratings given how this tastes. I'd only eat it if I hadn't eaten in several days and had nothing else. It's that bad.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: ONLY BAR I'LL EAT
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought I couldn't like a protein bar more than the Atlas Chocolate Cocoa, but this one might have topped it. Amazing flavor, same great nutritional value. As a college athlete concerned with performance and nutrition, Atlas Bars are really the only bar I want to put in my body.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy Schier

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting and Very Filling
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the atlas bar for its high protein and low sugar content. Hard to find protein bars with so few grams of sugar. Normally they pump sugar into them to make them taste bearable, but not this one. Its natural flavors are good enough to actually enjoy refueling naturally. My next purchase will be the Chocolate Cacao after seeing how good the Vanilla almond was. Additionally, 1 bar kept me full for hours, which was surprising. Would highly recommend this to anybody looking for a high quality protein bar
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome protein bars! Tastes great (amazing texture with dark chocolate and natural ingredients)!
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic protein bar with natural and minimally processed ingredients and a not-too-sweet dark chocolate flavor. The texture is consistent unlike many other bars that are gritty. A great meal replacement or healthy snack. Atlas is definitely a company to look out for in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Zeejet

customer_reviews.title: Weight maintenance made easy
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this stuff is amazing. My wife is hyper glycemic, and daughter hypo glycemic. I get a sugar head rush if I don’t have some protein and fat with my carbohydrates. So, these work perfectly for all of us. The ladies don’t have any blood sugar issues eating just these, and I can use one of these to chase a piece of bread or other carbohydrate heavy food, and I’m all balanced and feeling good. We are all maintaining the desired weight and don’t have any sugar cravings. Life is good.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Knight

customer_reviews.title: Dry, hard, and... not good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of the 4.5 star reviews. I am disappointed and amazed at how bad they are. The chocolate is like dense, dry, hard fudge -- without the good taste. You'd have to drink a glass of water with each bar or you might choke. I understand that tastes differ, but can so many people really like these??
customer_reviews.author: James R

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars!
customer_reviews.text: These Atlas protein bars have everything I'm looking for and they taste good for a protein bar. Good quality protein, low sugar, high fiber, substantial texture, and healthy fats, so I feel like I've eaten something rather than just wanting more.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Schoeninger

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it used to be...
customer_reviews.text: These used to be pretty tasty. It used to taste almost like a brownie. I believe they changed the ingredients or way they are made recently and now it's like eating chalk. You rarely get a a nice chunk of cacao and in some bars it's non existent. The bars are usually hard and chalky in texture now. There is a hint of the old flavor there, but definitely not like it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Jones Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Addicted to Atlas Bars
customer_reviews.text: I'm fully addicted to these bars, particularly the Chocolate Cacao. Not only do they taste great but they have a great nutritional profile and quality ingredients. My only complaint is that they use chocolate chips with cane sugar which I think could be avoided - especially in a bar touting itself as Paleo and "Keto Friendly". Still highly recommend just hope the next iteration removes the cane sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Brett N

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of the Atlas Bars. I've had the Peanut Butter Chip and the Chocolate Cacao so far and both are very tasty. I really appreciate the lack of sucralose and other artificial sweeteners that make their way into so many "healthy" supplement bars. Honestly, the biggest issue with these is to keep from eating the whole box in a day.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Atherton

customer_reviews.title: You definitely do NOT have to lower your expectations for low carb here!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many low-carb or keto bars and just don't expect much on the taste. These are definitely the exception! They are really good tasting, and have quality ingredients. I've reordered several times, and have not been disappointed with any flavor. My fave is the peanut butter, though :-) Thanks, Atlas, for giving us something GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, balanced, with clean ingredients
customer_reviews.text: The packaging update as of late 2019 seems to have included a formula tweak as I have noticed a softer, preferred texture. I would not consider myself a "bar" person because most are not clean-label enough for my taste and I will not eat soy protein sources or artificial ingredients. The chocolate almond Atlas bars seemed to strike a balance for me, not too sweet with good quality natural ingredients. I am a repeat customer for sure. I think people trying to reduce sugar, doing keto, and maybe some paleo (who eat whey) folks will like these.
customer_reviews.author: MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: New formula = no more purchases
customer_reviews.text: New formula with adaptagen looses the previous model's taste. Now it tastes awful and includes 2 adaptagens I don't want in my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Sad that Atlas Changed the Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: This used to be by far my favorite nutrition bar. Would order 2-3 cases through Subscribe and Save each month. However in August when my shipment arrived Atlas had adjusted the ingredient mix. What used to be a robust peanut butter flavor with rich chocolate chips had changed into your average powerbar - slimy, gritty with little peanut butter flavor and chocolate chips you can barely recognize. I thought it was a bad dream but my September order confirmed that this savorless bar was the new normal. I will no longer be purchasing this brand and will be searching once again for the next great nutrition bar.
customer_reviews.author: AT in SD

customer_reviews.title: No aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: This is the best kept bar we have found. My husband only likes chocolate bars, so I can't review the other flavors. This bar uses monk fruit extract for sweetener, and it has a good flavor with no aftertaste. The only problem is with Atlas Chocolate Cacao bars is that they sell out! So it is a good idea to preorder them. Or set up a recurrent order if you like them.
customer_reviews.author: dkny17rye

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite protein bars
customer_reviews.text: I prefer protein bars with low sugar and high fiber with natural sweeteners. These bars met my requirements. The taste and texture are fine but as you would expect from a bar with >10 grams of protein and 1 g of sugars. It doesn't taste like a candy bar. The calories are a bit higher than I would like, but again what you would expect for this high of protein content. The only protein bars that I have found that I like a bit better are the new Think Keto Protein bar, but they don't have nearly as much fiber. So, I will continue to purchase these as well.
customer_reviews.author: SSinCO

customer_reviews.title: You will be so happy you ordered them.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried every bar under the sun, and this guy beats them all. Can't compete with these macros and clean ingredients, and I don't know how they do it, but the taste is FANTASTIC. During more difficult workout sets I legitimately hype myself up by thinking about how I get to have an Atlas bar afterward, whereas typically protein bars for me are a matter of convenience instead of pure enjoyment. Do your body, and your taste buds, a favor and order these bars :)
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Kahhale

customer_reviews.title: Are these meant for human consumption?!
customer_reviews.text: The taste was simply not edible, sorry. I tried to like these but they were the equivalent of a bar of paste. Once you get it in your mouth, you’re not quite sure whether to use it as a substance to glue together a new doghouse out back or plug a few holes in the stucco.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to the protein bar kick and didn't realize how different many of them are from traditional bars (like Kind for example). When I opened it, it looked like the outside of a fig newton. The texture though is like nothing I've ever eaten. Almost like a nougat, very chewy and not smooth - it's hard to explain. It's pretty much a vanilla almond dog treat.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Almond Chip has become my new favorite
customer_reviews.text: I was loving the peanut butter chip for some time (and still do) but recently tried the almond chip. I think it tastes like the nougat in a milky way, and I love how big the chips are (like the pb chip bar). Also good are the chocolate and mint (more of brownie mint). I think the texture of these bars are going to be a hit or miss with people. I really like it, they have become my go to. I also feel like its the only bar that actually fills me.
customer_reviews.author: Aab1042

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try the new Atlas flavor PB and Raspberry. I really like the PB chip bars, so i was excited to try the new flavor. First though i wanted to say I feel like you either like the Atlas bars or don't, the texture I think could go either way. I personally really like them. I find the PB and Raspberry to take just like a PB&J, I'd say the closest bar or snack product to actually tasting like I'm eating the sandwich. Very good, and highly recommend, another win!
customer_reviews.author: Aab1042

customer_reviews.title: Love! Tastes like food.
customer_reviews.text: Love! Chewy, flavorful, great ingredients, no stevia, filling - I look forward to it each morning since trying them. PB Chip is the best, Vanilla Almond is a close second, Cocoa is a little too dry for my tastes. About 4-6 more grams of protein for the calories and I would say they’re perfect, but nothing ever is, is it. Switched from a plant based protein bar and am not sorry at all. Try out the sample pack.
customer_reviews.author: Lelu

customer_reviews.title: An Expensive Path to Hydration
customer_reviews.text: Pro: These taste like s'mores (graham crackers + chocolate bars) which is awesome. Con: But they're annoyingly expensive and the price per ounce keeps increasing (the new version is smaller than the previous). Pro: They're dry, become gummy and they suck every bit of moisture out of your mouth... so I can easily polish off an entire liter of water when I eat one. Conclusion: I justify the cost because most other bars are made of poor quality ingredients, these taste good, and sometimes I need to drink a lot of water. I save them for when I need to enjoy hydrating.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Terrific nutrition, ingredients, flavor
customer_reviews.text: Protein bars with this sort of nutritional profile - weighted heavily towards keto, with very few carbs - are hard to find. It's even harder for me to find bars that don't have cashews, which I try to avoid because of mold risk and because of the economic/environmental impact of cashew production. These bars come through wonderfully on all counts, and taste great! So happy to find protein bars I can rely on. I like the Chai Almond ones too.
customer_reviews.author: Apollo Grace

customer_reviews.title: Not my thing
customer_reviews.text: I tried, I really did to give these a chance. About the only ones I found I was ok with was the vanilla chai (which was still a little strong for me) and the peanut raspberry was probably the least artificial flavor. I'm constantly on the lookout for good tasting keto friendly bars and they are really few and far between. Better than quest bars for me, but not by much. I didn't feel that they were worth the price. I found I could stand 1-2 small pieces of these at a time before I wrapped them up and eventually threw away.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal Sherrod

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredients, no sugar
customer_reviews.text: I got my first box of Atlas bars last week. I am very happy to say I did not have any off reactions to any of the ingredients which is wonderful for me. I can feel the protein in the bars working to keep me feeling full and I don't need to eat a whole one to feel full. I eat about 1/2 of one before going out to walk the dog. I'm glad to have found a bar with quality ingredients and no honey, sugar or dried fruit, which I do not tolerate because they cause blood sugar swings. So good so far. I do plan to reorder as needed.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Not keto: Tapioca Fiber, +hormone disrupters
customer_reviews.text: I loved the previous formula despite being slightly higher in net carbs. New formula has Tapioca fiber which is a keto no-no- shown you spike insulin. Also, Ashwagandha and Maca Root are hormone disrupters- if you are a woman these can impact your cycle. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Schiffbauer

customer_reviews.title: Yukkkkk!
customer_reviews.text: I tried one and it was horrible! It was hard to bite into and it tasted just like play dough! Now what do I do with a whole box.
customer_reviews.author: R1198

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients, poor taste
customer_reviews.text: I love the ingredients list and nutritional stats but the taste is not the best. They are edible but chalky and extra dry... I will stick to RX Bars
customer_reviews.author: Luiza N. G. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Still Looking!
customer_reviews.text: I am recovering from surgery and not a breakfast person. Wanted a high protein alternative and have often eaten protein bars. I'm not a chocolate lover and it's difficult to find a good one. Had high hopes for Atlas. The flavor, vanilla almond, was fine although there should be cinnamon in the flavor name as well as it is prominent. It is filling and stays with you. However, it tastes too much like uncooked cookie dough, took me forever to eat and at one point got a bit stuck in my throat. Alas, I'll finish up this box but won't be ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: Bichon Mom

customer_reviews.title: The never ending search......
customer_reviews.text: I am always on the hunt for a good protein bar. However I always find them too sweet. This Atlas bar is great, not too sweet at all, satisfying, and the bonus is 85% cocoa chips. My only complaint, is for me, it takes a while for the almond or peanut butter to get out of my teeth!!! But swishing with water helps move it along, and again this is a very individual issue ;-) I buy the Peanut Butter Chip through subscribe & save, but I wish the Almond Chip was available that way as they are a staple in my day, glove compartment & gym bags.
customer_reviews.author: rgashton

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are amazing. They are my go to cheat on Keto, except not a cheat! With 4 net carbs, I was not expecting them to taste so flavorful. I have already ordered another box. Great for on the go as a meal or if I need something sweet I just have 1/2 with some tea or coffee. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Justmelms

customer_reviews.title: Not too sweet...very filling
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the flavor of these bars and I find that they are much more filling than any others I've tried. I am amazed that they easily replace a whole meal for me. I really like the fact that they are not super sweet. I do find their texture a bit chewy/gummy but that may be why they are so filling and satisfying. I like them so much that I have them on subscribe and save. If you like dark (not too sweet) chocolate you will like these.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Harlow

customer_reviews.title: What's with bad reviews?
customer_reviews.text: I've tried at least 15 different protein bars/cookies/snacks and this is the one I'm sticking with. There are other products with more proteins and less calories, but if you want something that has great taste (I've only ever gotten the chocolate cacao one),I highly recommend this product. I eat this bar either as breakfast supplement or a pre-workout snack, and it's been working great for me. I eat heavy lunch at 12:00 (lots of carbs), and get to the gym at 5:30 usually after eating this bar; gives me enough energy to do 1 hr of heavy lifting although i get completely exhausted; I'm trying to join 1K lbs club, and i'm at around 900 lbs now.
customer_reviews.author: Young Kyu Park

customer_reviews.title: Low sugar, amazing flavor
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find protein bars that are low sugar and made with quality ingredients. These not only meet those criteria, but also taste amazing. Perfect when you’re on the go or need quick recovery food post-workout. I don’t buy any other protein bars now, Atlas bars are head and shoulders above the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hedberg

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad!
customer_reviews.text: So there are several things I do like about these bars, I’ve only had the vanilla almond flavor so far: —the thick texture and size. Many bars are measly but these are thick, chewy and a good size —low sugar, which is why i bought these But i am not sure about the flavor. I guess I expected better based on the reviews. It’s kind of perfumy to me? I will keep and eat them but I won’t get this flavor again. Maybe next time I’ll try the chocolate or pb one.
customer_reviews.author: idigtexaspugs

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Dry. These are not bad, but if I gotta get 60 bars then they better be cheaper...
customer_reviews.text: For the price. I will not be buying these again. Grenades, Pure Protein, Atkins, Fit Crunch and Kirkland have beat these out, but even Fit Crunch is expensive, but DAMN does it taste great. If you want a good cheap bar then look for the Kirkland. They are ALMOST similar in composition, except the Kirklands are a tad chewier. And they only cost about $1.50 or less a bar too...
customer_reviews.author: Mantid Photographer

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients - Very good tasting - be advised - low sugar - but not low carb (not keto)
customer_reviews.text: I've had several shipments of these bars. They taste fantastic. The flavors are really good. They are made with clean ingredients. While they only have 3 grams of sugar - they still have 20+ grams of carbohydrates (12 are fiber so roughly 10 net carbs). If you are keto you might want to watch how often you eat them and make sure you have 10 grams of carbs in macro budget. If you do - they are really good. I really like ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nahrstadt

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose except.....
customer_reviews.text: These were a great find, checked all the boxes I am looking for as far as a high protein, low sugar, low carb. But it takes me quite some time to get it out of my teeth and swallowed down. They are satisfying and not sweet which is what I have been looking for. Now Amazon has the Almond Chocolate Chip on subscribed and safe as well. BONUS
customer_reviews.author: rgashton

customer_reviews.title: Atlas bars, the best there is
customer_reviews.text: Atlas bars are the best dietary discovery for me since sliced bread. These things are not only phenomenal tasting but are great meal replacements or snacks before/after the gym or a delicious dessert on a day off. Really kickstart my day with great taste, healthy ingredients & even give me steady energy. If I had to choose a favorite flavor I’d say all of them, wow. Never going back to plain old protein bars again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and tasty
customer_reviews.text: I bought Atlas protein bars three times and intended to buy more. First time I bought Chocolate Cacao flavor. But it felt a little sticky in my mouth. Maybe it’s just for me. The Chocolate Chips Almond is perfect for me. I like the healthy ingredients, high protein, really low sugar and low carbs. And it taste great. The only thing I don’t like is a price. I think the price for a box of ten is a little overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Milena

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite bar!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. They cost more than I would usually pay, but I initially tried them at a discounted price and I got hooked. My favs are the peanut butter and peanut butter raspberry... my mouth is watering as I am writing this... SO GOOD! I think I have tried them all and even the flavors I didn't think I was going to like, I did. I love the texture, the flavor, and they satisfy my hunger!
customer_reviews.author: Robin H.

customer_reviews.title: Atlas bars has excellent ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: Atlas bars pack a lot of protein, and it only has 3 grams of sugar. That's amazing! Only 3 grams and it's still sweet enough for me to enjoy without it tasting like dirt rocks. Sometimes it's hard for companies to have quality ingredients and quality tastes. Atlas accomplished both. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sinfully good yet supports my low carb life
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been a fan of protein bars - until Atlas!! I love these bars because they are rich tasting and satisfying. The peanut butter and chocolate chips taste like peanut butter cups! They’re all delicious and perfect with my low my low carb lifestyle. If you’re not sure, buy the Sample that has all 6 and try each one. It’s the best way.
customer_reviews.author: Harper Lee

customer_reviews.title: Like eating chalk
customer_reviews.text: The tagline of the product is, "If there is no struggle, there is no progress..." It is a struggle to eat these! The bars are just terrible. Just like a solid chalk bar. Crumble in your hand like dry-rot wood. Maybe they are different if they are fresh. But my batch is not edible. Sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Olivieri

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, chips are large and they are filling. Have a hard time finding bars that actually keep you from getting hungry within the hour, these actually keep me satisfied for longer than that. Also I don’t get a upset stomach or stomach pains after. Also love the Almond chip (tastes like the nougat in milk ways), chocolate and mint!! Some might not like the texture, but it’s a win for me
customer_reviews.author: Aab1042

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Look no further. These bars are phenomenal. Keto friendly, low sugar and decent tasting. Do they taste as good as the other pseudo-candy / protein bars? Well, no....but then again they aren't filled with tons of high sugar fillers or additives. Would love for them to be a bit less expensive, and yes they just reduced the size (annoying). Regardless, I still have them locked in on my monthly subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Roger G.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best in taste, tbh.
customer_reviews.text: I got interested in this because I was looking for high fiber, low carb protein bars. Unfortunately; the taste wasn’t the greatest. Also, the chewing was excessive. It sort of felt gummy, but flavorless. I’m not sure what went wrong, but the first few bars were pretty good (I ordered three of each), and then I just couldn’t swallow it. It tasted horrible. That’s why I’m giving it three stars. Try one out, you might like it. This is just my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Death_Zone

customer_reviews.title: Worst tasting protein bars with horrible aftertaste!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and the lemon bars and I opened one lemon bar and took one bite and had to spit it out. Terrible aftertaste. I gave them to my 46 year old daughter and three teenage boys and she said the same thing and why didn’t I return them. I just tasted the peanut butter and oh my, quality control just didn’t get the picture on how terrible the aftertaste and the whole tastes of these bars are. I don’t even want to keep them for emergency earthquake bars. Please may I return the peanut butter bars here. My daughter lives in OC and I will tell her what to do also.
customer_reviews.author: Golda

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein bars.
customer_reviews.text: These bars have pretty much everything I'm looking for in a protein bar. Quality protein and healthy fats, low sugar, high fiber, good taste, and non-gmo ingredients. If they were all organic, they'd be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Schoeninger

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bar I’ve had yet
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein bar I’ve tried yet. I ordered the peanut butter chocolate chip - it was delicious. My body can feel that’s it’s made with quality ingredients - unlike other bars that spike my blood sugar. I feel satiated and energized after eating these. Excited to try some of the other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: JBA

customer_reviews.title: Average product, poor value
customer_reviews.text: While Altas bars seem relatively popular given all the 4 and 5 star ratings, I found them to be average. Taste was decent, and consistency was similar to so many other protein bars. In isolation, I'd rate these a 3, but given the much higher price point relative to competing products, I reduced to 2 stars for what I consider a poor value overall.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Max

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and nutty
customer_reviews.text: These bars are great! I tried them when their kickstarter went active to see if I wanted to back the new flavors. The texture is very protein powder like, which I enjoy and the flavors were nutty and malty. My favorite is the peanut butter and my husband loved the almond butter. These fit my goals eating dirty Keto and keep well in my purse!
customer_reviews.author: Meg SD

customer_reviews.title: What Happened?
customer_reviews.text: Just reordered a 30 box from their website and the bars taste totally different, are smaller and have more calories. I always purchase the peanut butter chocolate chip but I doubt I'll be buying again. I actually praised these bars in the past. Really unfortunate they've altered the ingredients. Also, I find the bars are no longer as satiating as before.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Quite tasty
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the flavor and texture of the bars. The only flavor I didn't care for was the Chai one, but that's a personal preference. I found the texture better if I kept the bars refrigerated over the pantry. Took off a star because I thought the price was pretty steep for what you received.
customer_reviews.author: Biker Belle

customer_reviews.title: Not your average protein Bar, BETTER!
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I was very pleased with this bar. It's very tasty and the flavors are great. Not the usual chalky type of protein Bar with bland tasting flavors. I eat a bar daily and will soon restock.
customer_reviews.author: Walisa

customer_reviews.title: GROSS & Disgusting!
customer_reviews.text: Sounded good, got a box on "sales, still expensive but thought they sounded healthy, well they are SO GROSS! Even our teen athletes Gagged, what a waste of money,. They told us just give them a jar peanut butter and bag chocolate chips for few bucks, $22 was a WASTE OF MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: lee297

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Protein Bars
customer_reviews.text: These bars are amazing. I was looking for a healthy, filling protein bar and my friend recommended these to me. I am hooked! They're now my go to pre or post workout snack. They are fantastic protein bars with natural ingredients. It's not too sweet, but sweet enough and the texture is really nice unlike other protein bars I've tried. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best bars out there
customer_reviews.text: I love that they don’t taste like sugar alcohols. (Don’t have). They taste like teal food. A bit dry, but not complaining - I like that. With a glass of water they’re perfect for meal or after workout.
customer_reviews.author: WorldTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, texture and balanced ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: I gave these 4 Stars. Flavors are good, texture is a touch chewy but OK. They pass my test for no product melting or sticking to the wrapper. Overall 4 stars is well earned based on my exhaustive search for the perfect protein bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s so hard to find decent protein sources on the go without tons of sugar, these are exactly what I’ve been looking for. Texture might be a little off putting for some, it’s essentially whey powder compacted into bar form. Initially was not a fan, but they’ve grown on me considerably. Peanut butter is delicious and the vanilla is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste but...
customer_reviews.text: This tasted so good! I really loved the flavor. But after I ate it it was stuck to all my teeth and it was thick too! I had to brush my teeth 3 times as well as floss to remove everything. Too Bad. If it wasn't for that, I would have given it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein bar
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein bar; not chalky which seem common with protein or keto bars and not too sweet. Best part, it is made locally where I live in Massachusetts.
customer_reviews.author: PiaMac

customer_reviews.title: Good bars!
customer_reviews.text: Taste great! Arrived in perfect condition, and company reached out to make sure I was happy with their bars.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Toro

customer_reviews.title: Taste and texture are no good
customer_reviews.text: The product had a hard texture that was hard to bite into. Once you bite into it, it is extremely dry and doesn't have a ton of taste. From a nutritional stand point, the product is fantastic, but unless you care nothing about the experience of the food itself and are just trying to fit macros together, I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for individual flavors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a variety pack in the past for 29, I liked everything from the flavor to the ingredients, thought the price was pretty great for a box of each flavor - I then bought just the chocolate flavor and yes, you only get one box for the 29 dollar price. That’s not worth it for me, so next time I will buy the variety so I get more for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Very Tasty and healthy!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something to sustain you while on Keto or low Carb, this is the bar for you! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Curt A.

customer_reviews.title: Forgettable & expensive
customer_reviews.text: Barely any flavor, sometimes hard to chew, and with no particular memorable quality. An easily forgettable expensive bar. Maybe the gas it caused and the price tag will stay in my memory for a while longer. I have no desire to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, good ingredients
customer_reviews.text: These bars are tasty. I normally eat for nutrition rather than taste but these bars have a great taste given the amount of healthy ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: tanya strasburg

customer_reviews.title: A better protein bar!
customer_reviews.text: One of the better protein bars out there. Entire family currently on Keto. Full KETO and modified. Carb count a bit high for hardcore KETO and need to be careful with count. Bars are delicious and have now tried other flavors purchased through Atlas site since Amazon is out of stock. We did monthly subscription of 30 bars for some savings. Daughter freezes then, says it tastes like a dessert that way.
customer_reviews.author: reddoorfinds

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but pricy
customer_reviews.text: These are really tasty! I love the ingredients and the texture. I do wish they were a little more affordable though! All in all, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Letica

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: Awful tasting and hard to swallow so not sure if fresh or not. Such a brick!
customer_reviews.author: Greta Gwyn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good!
customer_reviews.text: Good and get the job done. I keep them in my car when I need a meal replacement or big snack. Glad I found them on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: A. West

customer_reviews.title: Texture is weird
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about my bars, but the texture is so weird, it gets stuck into my teeth easily. Maybe mines not fresh or maybe it’s suppose to be like that. I don’t see why the ratings for this is high.
customer_reviews.author: M.V

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite protein bar.
customer_reviews.text: I love that these bars are low in sugar and high in protein with quality ingredients. They have become my favorite go to bar and they taste great. Not all protein bars give me energy, but these are perfect on the go and to help keep my energy up.
customer_reviews.author: djamison

customer_reviews.title: Like eating dust with glue mixed in only more vile
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely disgusting.....I can guarantee the rest will be donated to someone who has no sense of taste at all..... they are like thick dust bars that when they come into contact with saliva turn to glue..... repulsive......do not purchase!!!! WOLO bars IMHO are the best tasting bars on the market currently.....
customer_reviews.author: Sarah in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Just not good. Try another brand.
customer_reviews.text: These simply are not good. My wife and I have been searching for some new protein bars that are keto/paleo, grain free, etc. These are the worst tasting and the worst texture of the half dozen or so brands we’ve tried to date. They’re also as expensive, if not more expensive, than all of the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Darr

customer_reviews.title: average
customer_reviews.text: man the vanilla is really good. but peanut butter was pretty bad and dry and hard to eat. chocolate was average at best. i would buy again if i could purchase the vanilla only
customer_reviews.author: A. Papa

customer_reviews.title: YESSSS!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write product reviews, but I felt like I had to with this one. Most protein bars taste have a weird texture and/or terrible aftertaste. This bar (chocolate cacao) has neither of those. It was wonderful. It tasted like a treat, but wasn't overly sweet and didn't taste like an industrial chemical experiment. With a busy work, school and home life, I am confident these will be a go to once a day for a quick and tasty meal. The cost is well worth the convenience and taste. Now I just need to try the peanut butter and vanilla almond!
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Taste great, good ingredients list
customer_reviews.text: Considering that the ingredients list was super clean, these tasted good. Very dense and filling which is a plus. Only real downside was the price tag, this isn’t a cheap snack, but if you don’t want junk food in your mouth you can’t pay junk food price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M. James

customer_reviews.title: Best keto bar with no added sugar.
customer_reviews.text: Best keto low carb bar I have ever had. And I have tried them all!!!! So hard to find actual great tasting bar with no added sugar that are low carb or keto. But those Chocolate flavored one are the best ever. Seriously it’s ridiculous!!!! I just cannot buy them every week as it gets really pricey unfortunately. But worth the money nonetheless!
customer_reviews.author: Carine D

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on June 7th, the bars that showed up three days later expired May 4th. This seems to be a common theme with bars like this on Amazon, do yourself a favor and find a GNC or Vitamin Shoppe.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Tidd

customer_reviews.title: Chalky texture but not bad
customer_reviews.text: I’m revising my review - after having several now I’m getting a little more used to the texture and flavor- I don’t know that I’ll buy them again but they are better than I initially thought
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS Keto bars!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the peanut butter chocolate chip bars the most. The other two flavors aren't my favorite, nor are they as moist as the pb chocolate chip bar. I love that these bars have superfoods packed in that don't change the flavor. These bars don't hurt my stomach and are so low in net carbs. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Bars
customer_reviews.text: I like Atlas Bars they are easy to eat and take away your hunger when eating for a pick-up and snack. The reason that I gave it 4 stars is that I don't personally like one of the flavors. I would recommend buying them however they are a bit on the expensive side. I wish that they could find a way to lower the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Fato

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: They were very dry and I did not like the taste at all. Very expensive and very hard to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: I really dislike these
customer_reviews.text: These are like compressed whey with glue. The chocolate was the only redeeming bar of the three in the variety box. I regret buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Brown

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Good, and Good For Me
customer_reviews.text: I like the chocolate and peanut butter flavors. (The Vanilla Almond, not so much). I like having a one-a-day bar like this that I can have between 3-6 pm, as I do a late dinner, especially one that has a nice 1-2 punch of fiber and protein. It's on my rotation now, I'll continue purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: TS7

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, not too sweet
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite protein bars. Good taste, not too sweet. Does not have that synthetic taste that many protein bars without sugar have. They are a little pricey, but worth it. I have only ever been able to find these on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Andy C.

customer_reviews.title: A shadow of its former self
customer_reviews.text: They changed the recipe and it’s not as good as it once was. Broke my heart. They were my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Lukas Matthews

customer_reviews.title: So far, mostly good!
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is great! Great chocolate taste, and NOT too sweet. I’m into it. The texture is why I gave it only four stars. It’s a little crumbly, and it kind of sticks to the teeth, but I’m sure I’ll get used to it. Whatever. I’ll probably buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas R. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Favorite bars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite. I keep them in the freezer because I noticed the so get hard if kept for extended time. I consider this a good thing as fewer preservatives. Freezer keeps them fresh and delicious! Perfect for skiing, hiking or afternoon snack.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kindel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the try:)
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all! I loooooove peanut butter and this satisfy my peanut butter cravings. It’s Chewy and has a thick consistency like most protein bars which I’d like to believe helps me feel full Longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlady

customer_reviews.title: Best bars!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bars I’ve had. No sugar alcohols taste, it actually tastes like real food!
customer_reviews.author: WorldTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Sort of an odd experience
customer_reviews.text: They got the nutrition right but the extra sticky texture is unlike any bar that I ever tried. There are better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: AZ-Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious protein bars
customer_reviews.text: I really like those protein bars! They taste good and they are not hard or grainy! They have a good chewy structure, which I like it! Definitely buying more....
customer_reviews.author: ilze

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: These bars came recommended by a friend so we tried them and we are big fans! We got the variety pack and they are all delicious! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Abrams

product_meta.title: Atlas Bar - Keto Protein Bars, Classics Variety - High Protein, Low Sugar, Low Carb, Grass Fed Whey, Healthy Protein, Gluten Free, Soy Free (9-Pack)
feature_bullets: IRRESISTIBLY DELICIOUS: Creamy, crunchy, salty and sweet – spice up your life with three delicious high protein flavors including Chocolate Cacao, Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip, and Vanilla Almond Chai

KETO & LOW CARB FRIENDLY: Low in sugar and net carbs, high in performance-boosting nutrition. Always real ingredients, never any junk. Keto, paleo, low glycemic, gluten free, grain free, soy free, GMO free and nothing artificial. Everything your body needs, nothing that it doesn’t

HIGHEST QUALITY PROTEIN: We use 100% grass-fed whey protein from pasture raised cows that eat a nutrient rich, grass diet, which creates a higher concentration of vitamins, minerals, and other performance-boosting nutrients

OPTIMAL HEALTHY FUEL: Made with wholesome high-quality ingredients, our high protein bars are the perfect snack whether you’re working at home, hiking a mountain, or anywhere in between. No matter when or where, our bars will help you meet your health goals

BOOST PERFORMANCE: The first protein bar of its kind, Atlas Bar features a superfood performance blend powered by Organic KSM-66 Ashwagandha. Ashwagandha has been used for thousands of years to help increase strength, improve cognition, boost energy, and aid recovery

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
